name: Wispper
description:
Find your way back to Wispper Mountain.  Collect the cubes and race down the mountains, just watch your step, and don't panic!

Controls:

WASD & Mouse for movement

Space - Jump, hold longer to charge your jump

C - Change camera view

Mouse wheel - Zoom in & out

Shift - Focus zoom

P - Pause & menu

Made by:
David 'Don Punch' Gates
Jamie 'GeeksGoneBad' Cunningham
Clayton 'Urist' Campbell

Made in Unreal Engine 4
Using Houdini Indie

Pre-Existing Assets:

1 Rock Model & 1 background mesh from UE4 starter content

Landscape textures from Megascans

Music from filmmusic.io:
    Lofi by DreamHeaven
    Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/6148-lofi
    License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Jump SoundFX: Soundly
